1. Go to '...'
2. Click on '....'
3. Scroll down to '....'
4. See error

A clear and concise description of what you expected to happen.

- **Hub**: [e.g. Cozytouch, eedoums, Hi Kumo, Rexel, Somfy Connexoon, Somfy TaHoma]
